name: Trailer Shop Simulator
description:
Being on the run from the mafia for more than 10 years, you managed to hide for a while in a cozy sunny town. Develop, buy weapons, engage in all available types of business, in order to eventually fight back against a large criminal organization.

Features
  • Turn your dilapidated booth into the best retail store in town. Buy different products, electrical appliances, set up your company. To do this, you have all the possibilities.

  • Increase your rating. Every customer killed or unserved lowers your rating, so you must provide them with both protection and quality service.

  • Expand your field of activity. On one sale of goods, you will not go far, so it is worth investing in the purchase of computers that will serve a large number of people, and thus bring a large profit. Another way to earn money is to produce your own products and sell them wholesale.

  • Automation of processes. Buy the right equipment to partially automate your work, thus you will have more time and opportunities.

  • Not only do cats have 9 lives! Do not forget about your needs, and also keep an eye on your health. Medical insurance will allow you to recover after a serious injury, so take care of its availability in the first place.

  • Sellers also know how to shoot! A major criminal organization that has been keeping the entire city in terror for more than 30 years finds out that you are freely promoting your business without their knowledge, so they decide to punish you for such audacity. Buy weapons, turrets, and destroy enemies who are trying to kill you and your customers. Each time the mafia gets stronger and stronger, do not forget to improve your arsenal!
